Articles.Content:
Is there a way to return the brightness to default?

Read the OP.

Read the OP.

I read the OP, my brightness did not change back to default.

Ba dum, ching. I'm here all week. Try the lobster.

You, Sir, go and play some Cities: Skylines. Please.

Also, since you mention lobster - I'm going to play a favorite song of mine from The B-52's now.

Time to learn something new

Heh - if I ever start getting into renderer side stuff I'm not sure the world would ever be the same (me and renderer tech don't get on - its all witchcraft)
CKAN updated to mark this as compatible with 1.0.4 as well as .3

CKAN updated to mark this as compatible with 1.0.4 as well as .3

Thanks - I just managed to find time to update to 1.0.3 then 1.0.4 popped, by which time r/l caught up with me and I didn't have time to push another versions only update. Should have it this week though.
Finally got around to pushing 1.4.4.2, just to update compatibility in version info.
I love this, since the beginning! Should be stock!
Well thanks
Glad to see you're still with us!
I try to if time permits.
Simple rebuild for 1.0.5
Any chance of some future update not requiring the toolbar plugin?

Hello, as is probably well known now there is no more kerbalstuff. Spacedock is up and running as a replacement with apparently a lot of the same functionality.

Are there plans to update things/upload to spacedock so ALA works with CKAN again?

1 hour ago, John FX said:

Hello, as is probably well known now there is no more kerbalstuff. Spacedock is up and running as a replacement with apparently a lot of the same functionality.

Are there plans to update things/upload to spacedock so ALA works with CKAN again?

Yeah I've re-created the entry for ALA on spacedock. If that goes pop though, I'm just going to go github only in future, so CKAN will just have to find it on there, and it'll be for CKAN side to re-link it or whatever, as I don't use CKAN so can't comment on whether the setup matches.

Crazy. I was just looking at this thread and two comments appear when the last ones were from ~3 months ago.

I'm not sure how complex this mod is under the hood, but it is very handy. Would it be at all possible to have different settings between the 'in flight' view and the map mode? Or just to have it apply while in flight, but not in map mode? This mod is basically necessary for the craft itself to look decent while in flight, but the same effect seems to ruin the dark side of Kerbin/Earth, which can look damn pretty with Scatterer and EVE or RVE.
Since 1.1 pre hit, I hope this will get updated, soon. It is just so convenient

On 03/04/2016 at 7:36 AM, Bizz Keryear said:

Since 1.1 pre hit, I hope this will get updated, soon. It is just so convenient 

I'm currently waiting on Blizzy's toolbar for 1.1 - I'll have a look tonight at the much delayed 'looking at a stock toolbar option/version', but don't hold your breath, ALA is written in a quite toolbar centric way.

18 hours ago, timmers_uk said:

I'm currently waiting on Blizzy's toolbar for 1.1 - I'll have a look tonight at the much delayed 'looking at a stock toolbar option/version', but don't hold your breath, ALA is written in a quite toolbar centric way.

Ok I'm not waiting on Blizzy's toolbar for 1.1 ...

New release on first page - build for 1.1 Prerelease, supports Stock Applauncher (toolbar), but *in theory* will switch to using Blizzy's toolbar when that is available for 1.1 assuming the interface stays the same (untested).

Default slider position is top left because I can't see a nice way to get the applauncher position (unlike Blizzy's toolbar, which handles this nicely), but I've added support for dragging the slider elsewhere on the screen.

 

Edit to add : Note - right now the stock mode doesn't support middle/right click on Applauncher to reset/switch to setting2 - I'd be interested to know if people would be ok with buttons next to the slider for doing these things (reset to default + setting1/2 toggle) - I'm kindof inclined that way as it makes operation a bit more obvious.

 

.... I'm also not ignoring requests for per-scene settings, but want to get this working for 1.1 first.

Edited April 5, 2016 by timmers_uk

Yep already seen the issue(s).

New release going up (already) ...

Added the toggle setting A/B button (the one with letter 'T') and reset current setting )the one with letter 'R') to the panel.

Fixed proliferation of toolbar buttons after scene change, and NPEs from autohide coroutine.

Done.

 

New release uploaded (and wasn't that a pain in the ambients uploading whilst on the train!).

  • Changed default position when using stock toolbar.
  • Save slider position to settings.dat

I haven't seen a repeat of the NPE, but I did find one place where maybe it could have come from, so I'd be interested to know if you are still getting the NPE ... though puzzled on the cause - I can't wait for someone to get the debug patches updated to allow debugging the thing.

Edited April 5, 2016 by timmers_uk
